commit.message:
[AArch64 Doc] Clarify feature modifiers {no,}{fp,simd,crypto}

gcc:

	* doc/invoke.texi: Clarify AArch64 feature modifiers (no)fp, (no)simd
	and (no)crypto.

From-SVN: r224909

files.patch:

+	and (no)crypto.
